job_tasks.phrase: Thrive on collaboration; work closely with Product, Design and other teams to define requirements, provide technical insights, and deliver AI-driven features.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand business needs (define requirements) and translate them into technical solutions (provide technical insights, deliver AI-driven features) by working with non-technical teams like Product and Design.

job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop and deploy full-stack solutions that seamlessly integrate AI capabilities into web-based applications.
job_tasks.justification: This clearly describes the core activities of building and integrating software, specifically focusing on full-stack development and application integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Conduct thorough testing, including unit testing and integration testing, to ensure the quality, performance, and reliability of AI features.
job_tasks.justification: Testing is a fundamental part of software development, ensuring the quality and reliability of the developed features.

job_tasks.phrase: Optimize implementations for performance and scalability
job_tasks.justification: Optimization for performance and scalability are key concerns in software development to ensure applications run efficiently and can handle increased load.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI technologies and contribute ideas for the continuous improvement of AI driven features.
job_tasks.justification: While this primarily speaks to learning and innovation, the phrase 'continuous improvement of AI driven features' indirectly suggests involvement in refining the data and models that power these features, which can fall under data engineering aspects like feature updates or model retraining preparation.

soft_skills.phrase: Thrive on collaboration; work closely with Product, Design and other teams to define requirements, provide technical insights, and deliver AI-driven features.
Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI technologies and contribute ideas for the continuous improvement of AI driven features.
contribute ideas for the continuous improvement of AI driven features.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on general software engineering tasks like full-stack development, testing, and optimization. While it mentions AI-driven features, it lacks specific details about generative AI techniques, LLMs, RAG, or fine-tuning, which are the hallmarks of a GenAI Engineer role. The emphasis is on integrating AI rather than building foundational AI models or systems.
